name: Sid Chakravarthy
description: Sid Chakravarthy is the founder of StaTwig, a technology company dedicated to revolutionizing global supply chains through advanced technologies such as blockchain, IoT, and AI. With a background in software development and a passion for innovation, Sid has successfully led StaTwig to implement impactful solutions like VaccineLedger, enhancing supply chain transparency and efficiency in public health. His work has been recognized by the United Nations and featured in Forbes Blockchain Top 50.
